divs: Sighting DetailsI reported this sighting shortly after in June.Tonight Aug 23,I was compelled to look at my cities website[portcolborne.ca]Low and behold on this website appears to be a video posted on youtube on portcolborne.ca of what appears to be the same U.F.O that I witnessed on June 1 2013 but this video was shot in 2010!!!The video is of of a triangular object with three spherical white lights but at times only two are illuminated exactly what I saw out of my window!What compelled me to get out of bed that night and look out the window to immediately witness this event and then see a video on YouTube tonight of an identical object.I have goosebumps and am teary eyed and freaked out.I thought I should let you know.Check out the video on YouTube at portcolborne.ca.This is what I saw three years later fly by my window.I have chills knowing that this is a repeat event.Thanks.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Port Colborne
There was one other sighting in Port Colborne on or around June 1st 2013
Summary: spherical lights descended at 45 degree angle leveled at treetop level
